languages.text: "Не пройду, если невиновность будет доказана предварительным расследованием, например. В остальных случаях убийство — это заурядное нарушение порядка. Моего вмешательства потребует разве что нападение на функционера {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Администратума{/g} или на другое важное лицо. Тогда я обязан принять меры".

"Unless said man's innocence has been previously established, such as during an investigation. In any other scenario, murder is just a common disturbance. My intervention is only required in the case of an attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Administratum functionary{/g} or some other important figure — then, I must take measures."
languages.original_text: "Не пройду, если невиновность будет доказана предварительным расследованием, например. В остальных случаях убийство — это заурядное нарушение порядка. Моего вмешательства потребует разве что нападение на функционера {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Администратума{/g} или на другое важное лицо. Тогда я обязан принять меры".

My intervention is only required in the case of an attack on an Administratum functionary or some other important figure — then, I must take measures."

My intervention is only required in the case of an attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Administratum functionary{/g} or some other important figure — then, I must take measures."

"Unless said man's innocence has been previously established, such as during an investigation. In any other scenario, murder is just a common disturbance. My intervention is only required in the case of an attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Administratum functionary{/g} or some other important figure — then, I must take measures."

languages.text: 「ただし、その男の無実がすでに捜査などによって証明されている場合は別です。それ以外の状況では、殺人などはただのありふれた騒ぎにすぎません。私が介入するのは、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}行政局の職員{/g}や他の重要人物が襲撃された場合のみです。その時には、しかるべき措置を取らねばなりません」
languages.original_text: "Unless said man's innocence has been previously established, such as during an investigation. In any other scenario, murder is just a common disturbance. My intervention is only required in the case of an attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Administratum functionary{/g} or some other important figure — then, I must take measures."

traits.locale_text: 「ただし、その男の無実がすでに捜査などによって証明されている場合は別です。それ以外の状況では、殺人などはただのありふれた騒ぎにすぎません。私が介入するのは、行政局の職員や他の重要人物が襲撃された場合のみです。その時には、しかるべき措置を取らねばなりません」

languages.text: "Ja, außer die Unschuld der besagten Person wurde zuvor bewiesen, etwa im Rahmen einer Untersuchung. In allen anderen Szenarien ist Mord lediglich eine gewöhnliche Störung. Mein Eingreifen ist nur erforderlich, wenn ein Angriff auf einen {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Funktionär des Administratums{/g} oder eine andere wichtige Person vorliegt – dann muss ich Maßnahmen ergreifen."
languages.original_text: "Unless said man's innocence has been previously established, such as during an investigation. In any other scenario, murder is just a common disturbance. My intervention is only required in the case of an attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Administratum functionary{/g} or some other important figure — then, I must take measures."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, außer die Unschuld der besagten Person wurde zuvor bewiesen, etwa im Rahmen einer Untersuchung. In allen anderen Szenarien ist Mord lediglich eine gewöhnliche Störung. Mein Eingreifen ist nur erforderlich, wenn ein Angriff auf einen Funktionär des Administratums oder eine andere wichtige Person vorliegt – dann muss ich Maßnahmen ergreifen."

languages.text: « En effet, sauf si l'innocence de cet humain a été prouvée au préalable lors d'une enquête. Si l'on exclut ce cas de figure, un meurtre n'est, au pire, qu'un désagrément ordinaire. Mon intervention n'est requise qu'en cas d'agression d'un {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}fonctionnaire de l'Administratum{/g} ou de toute autre personne occupant un poste important. Dans ce cas, je suis dans l'obligation de prendre des mesures adaptées. »
languages.original_text: "Unless said man's innocence has been previously established, such as during an investigation. In any other scenario, murder is just a common disturbance. My intervention is only required in the case of an attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Administratum functionary{/g} or some other important figure — then, I must take measures."

traits.locale_text: « En effet, sauf si l'innocence de cet humain a été prouvée au préalable lors d'une enquête. Si l'on exclut ce cas de figure, un meurtre n'est, au pire, qu'un désagrément ordinaire. Mon intervention n'est requise qu'en cas d'agression d'un fonctionnaire de l'Administratum ou de toute autre personne occupant un poste important. Dans ce cas, je suis dans l'obligation de prendre des mesures adaptées. »

languages.text: «A menos que la inocencia de ese hombre fuese establecida de antemano, por ejemplo durante una investigación. En cualquier otro caso, un homicidio no supone más que un incidente común. Mi intervención solamente se requiere si se produce un ataque contra un {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}funcionario del Administratum{/g} u otro individuo de similar importancia; entonces sí he de tomar medidas».
languages.original_text: "Unless said man's innocence has been previously established, such as during an investigation. In any other scenario, murder is just a common disturbance. My intervention is only required in the case of an attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Administratum functionary{/g} or some other important figure — then, I must take measures."

traits.locale_text: «A menos que la inocencia de ese hombre fuese establecida de antemano, por ejemplo durante una investigación. En cualquier otro caso, un homicidio no supone más que un incidente común. Mi intervención solamente se requiere si se produce un ataque contra un funcionario del Administratum u otro individuo de similar importancia; entonces sí he de tomar medidas».

languages.text: “除非受害者的清白已经得到了证实，例如调查过程中。如果换做是其他情况，谋杀仅仅是常见的干扰而已。只有当{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}内政部官员{/g}或其他重要人物遭到袭击时，我才会出手干预。而且在这种情况下，我是必须要采取措施的。”
languages.original_text: "Unless said man's innocence has been previously established, such as during an investigation. In any other scenario, murder is just a common disturbance. My intervention is only required in the case of an attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Administratum functionary{/g} or some other important figure — then, I must take measures."

traits.locale_text: “除非受害者的清白已经得到了证实，例如调查过程中。如果换做是其他情况，谋杀仅仅是常见的干扰而已。只有当内政部官员或其他重要人物遭到袭击时，我才会出手干预。而且在这种情况下，我是必须要采取措施的。”

languages.text: "Öncesinde söz konusu adamın masumiyeti örneğin bir soruşturma sırasında kanıtlanmamışsa evet. Diğer her senaryoda, cinayet sadece yaygın bir rahatsızlıktan ibarettir. Müdahalem, yalnızca bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Administratum{/g} görevlisine veya başka bir önemli kişiye saldırıldığı durumda elzemdir. Böyle bir durum, önlem almayı gerektirir."
languages.original_text: "Unless said man's innocence has been previously established, such as during an investigation. In any other scenario, murder is just a common disturbance. My intervention is only required in the case of an attack on an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratumGlossary}Administratum functionary{/g} or some other important figure — then, I must take measures."

traits.locale_text: "Öncesinde söz konusu adamın masumiyeti örneğin bir soruşturma sırasında kanıtlanmamışsa evet. Diğer her senaryoda, cinayet sadece yaygın bir rahatsızlıktan ibarettir. Müdahalem, yalnızca bir Administratum görevlisine veya başka bir önemli kişiye saldırıldığı durumda elzemdir Böyle bir durum önlem almayı gerektirir."

languages.original_text: "Unless said man's innocence has been previously established, such as during an investigation. In any other scenario, murder is just a common disturbance. My intervention is only required in the case of an attack on an Administratum functionary or some other important figure — then, I must take measures."
